# php-xampp-server

XAMPP-based web site. Download repo into the xampp\htdocs\[your_site_name] folder.
In order to work project relies on connection to the MySQL database via specific user, use scripts below to create DB schema and required user.

```
-- MySQL Script generated by MySQL Workbench
-- Wed Sep 11 14:00:17 2024
-- Model: New Model    Version: 1.0
-- MySQL Workbench Forward Engineering

SET @OLD_UNIQUE_CHECKS=@@UNIQUE_CHECKS, UNIQUE_CHECKS=0;
SET @OLD_FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=@@FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS, FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=0;
SET @OLD_SQL_MODE=@@SQL_MODE, SQL_MODE='ONLY_FULL_GROUP_BY,STRICT_TRANS_TABLES,NO_ZERO_IN_DATE,NO_ZERO_DATE,ERROR_FOR_DIVISION_BY_ZERO,NO_ENGINE_SUBSTITUTION';

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Schema mydb
-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Schema andre053_mfc_site
-- -----------------------------------------------------

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Schema andre053_mfc_site
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS `andre053_mfc_site` DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci ;
USE `andre053_mfc_site` ;

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `andre053_mfc_site`.`knowledge_base`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `andre053_mfc_site`.`knowledge_base` (
  `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` TEXT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 6
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `andre053_mfc_site`.`messages`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `andre053_mfc_site`.`messages` (
  `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `username` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  `message` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `timestamp` TIMESTAMP NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 55
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `andre053_mfc_site`.`tickets`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `andre053_mfc_site`.`tickets` (
  `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `date` DATE NOT NULL,
  `name` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  `description` TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `user` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  `status` SET('На рассмотрении', 'Отклонено', 'В процессе', 'Выполнено') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'На рассмотрении',
  `type` SET('Внутриорганизационная', 'Клиентоориентированная') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Внутриорганизационная',
  `updated_at` TIMESTAMP NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 38
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `andre053_mfc_site`.`users`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `andre053_mfc_site`.`users` (
  `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `username` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  `password` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  `role` ENUM('default', 'admin') NULL DEFAULT 'default',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE INDEX `username` (`username` ASC) VISIBLE)
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 6
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


SET SQL_MODE=@OLD_SQL_MODE;
SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS=@OLD_FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS;
SET UNIQUE_CHECKS=@OLD_UNIQUE_CHECKS;
```

This set of MySQL commands creates local MySQL user with full access to andre053_mfc_site schema.
```
CREATE USER 'andre053_pmauser'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'PASSWORD1478';
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON andre053_mfc_site.* TO 'andre053_pmauser'@'localhost';
FLUSH PRIVILEGES;
```
